Help & Tips

Getting Started

1. Index a folder containing images
2. Use text search to find images by description
3. Use image search to find similar images
4. Explore clusters and visualizations

Search Tips

• Use descriptive phrases: "red car in sunset"
• Try different perspectives: "aerial view of city"
• Use emotions: "happy people", "peaceful landscape"

Clustering

• Auto mode finds optimal clusters automatically
• K-means requires you to specify number of clusters
• DBSCAN finds clusters of varying density
